technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, mentioning feeling concerned and scared for the people being affected.
communal_orientation: The participant asked questions and seemed engaged in the conversation, but did not give affirmations or build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation, genuinely conversing with their partner and trying to keep the conversation going.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of vaccines.
booster_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of boosters.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity, considering different ideas and perspectives in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant was very polite and engaged in the conversation.
